file.name: oneOf_discriminator-changed_2.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: oneOf test for issue 29
  version: '1.0'
servers:
  - url: 'http://localhost:8000/'
paths:
  /state:
    post:
      operationId: update
      requestBody:
        content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                oneOf:
                  - $ref: '#/components/schemas/A'
                  - $ref: '#/components/schemas/B'
                discriminator:
                  propertyName: othertype
                  mapping:
                    a-type: '#/components/schemas/A'
                    b-type: '#/components/schemas/B'
        required: true
      responses:
        '201':
          description: OK
components:
  schemas:
    A:
      type: object
      properties:
        realtype:
          type: string
        othertype:
          type: string
        message:
          type: string
    B:
      type: object
      properties:
        realtype:
          type: string
        othertype:
          type: string
        description:
          type: string
        code:
          type: integer
          format: int32

Error: buildIR: make ir: path "/state": post: requestBody: contents: application/json: schema: oneOf: discriminator: unable to map a-type to #/components/schemas/A
